title: Investicreator

fields.name: Investigate the Creator:
fields.value: You will receive a list of players each Night proportional to your score. You may choose one to investigate- you will see who created their role.

fields.name: Create the Investigator (x0, Charge 120%):
fields.value: Target a player. You will grant them a random, non-locked investigative ability from a Town or Dubious role. If the ability has ammo, it starts with 1 ammo for your target.
